hero.subheadline: Break the language barrier and discover the world. Chat in your native tongue, meet diverse cultures, and build meaningful global connections.
hero.note: Be the first to experience a world without borders. Zero spam. Pure connection.

success.title: You're on the Early Access List!
success.description: We've received your request with {{email}}. Stay tuned here for updates about early access and launch announcements.

error.title: Registration Failed
error.description: We couldn't add you to the list. Please check your connection and try again.

faq.a1: It is the world's first social platform to integrate real-time AI translation, allowing you to meet, chat, and learn from anyone globally without any linguistic friction.
faq.a2: We leverage advanced Neural Machine Translation (NMT) via Google Cloud AI to ensure context-aware, human-like, and culturally sensitive conversations.
faq.q3: Is there any latency in the chat?
faq.a3: No. Our Node.js-driven backend architecture is optimized for millisecond-fast processing, delivering a seamless real-time communication experience.
faq.a4: Absolutely. All communications are end-to-end encrypted and processed through secure, automated APIs with a strict zero-knowledge policy.
faq.q5: How do you handle fake profiles?
faq.a5: We enforce mandatory OTP (One-Time Password) verification and AI-assisted biometric validation to ensure every connection is authentic.
faq.q6: Why should I join the waitlist?
faq.a6: Waitlist members receive priority beta invites, an exclusive 'Global Pioneer' digital badge, and 3 months of complimentary Premium access.
faq.a7: Node2Date will launch simultaneously on iOS and Android, built on a high-performance React Native architecture for a native-feel experience.
faq.q8: Are you open to strategic partnerships?
faq.a8: Yes. For investment opportunities or strategic partnership inquiries, please contact our executive team at hello@node2date.com.

tech.subtitle: A robust foundation of cutting-edge technologies designed to deliver a seamless, secure, and lightning-fast global experience.

card1.title: Real-Time AI Translation
card1.body: Instantaneous message translation across 100+ languages using industry-leading <highlight>Cloud APIs</highlight>. Connect with the world, instantly.

card2.title: Cross-Platform Native
card2.body: Native-level performance with fluid <highlight>60FPS animations</highlight>. Optimized for the modern global ecosystem using a unified React Native codebase.

card3.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
card3.body: Robust security featuring <highlight>OTP authentication</highlight> and <highlight>end-to-end privacy</highlight> protocols. Your global data integrity is our top priority.

founder.quote: I am architecting a future of borderless communication. A world where language is no longer a barrier to finding meaningful global connections.
founder.name: Fatih Acar
founder.title: Founder & CEO, Node2Date
founder.status: Currently in Early Access Development Phase.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address. It must contain '@' and a domain, for example: name@example.com.
